name: pbenson.github.io
body:
### Welcome to Pete's GitHub 
This is a collection of my shared work. My current focus is on students in the [Quantitative Finance and Risk Management](https://lsa.umich.edu/math/graduates/quantitative-finance.html) program at the University of Michigan.

### QFRM boot camp
In the QFRM boot camp, you will develop your personal web presence with your [umich page](https://lsa.umich.edu/math/people/quantitative-finance-risk-management-students.html), your GitHub user page linked to GitHub projects (a page like this, but yours, not mine), and Jupyter notebooks that demonstrate your Python skills as they relate to finance.

Bootcamp requires that you have [Atom](https://atom.io), [Anaconda](https://www.continuum.io/downloads), and [GitHub Desktop](https://desktop.github.com) installed.

See the Boot Camp project [here](qfrm-bootcamp).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
